call.name: Call a number
call.description: Call any number with one touch

phonenumber.label: Number
phonenumber.help: The number of your friend. (don't worry, we never store numbers)

camera.name: Instagram Camera
camera.description: Opens the Instagram camera in one click

tag.name: By Tag
tag.description: Search Instagram by a tag to display the latest images with that tag

tag.label: Tag
tag.help: Enter a tag such as 'scenery' to see loads of beautiful scenic shots

playlist.name: Open Playlist
playlist.description: Open Spotify to your favourite playlist

username.label: Username
username.help: The username of the person who owns the playlist

playlistId.label: Playlist Id
playlistId.help: The Id of the playlist, you can get this from the share link of a playlist (i.e. the id of http://open.spotify.com/user/benhuggy/playlist/7zn31Ki6T8VX5dadfoJEg7 is 7zn31Ki6T8VX5dadfoJEg7)

starred.name: Open Starred Playlist
starred.description: Open your starred playlist on Spotify

publicTransport.name: Take me home (public transport)
publicTransport.description: Get directions straight to your front door with one click

tag.label: Your desired location
tag.help: Enter a full address, for best results include your postcode
